titleStmt.title: An account of the rotula arithmetica invented by Mr. George Brown.
titleStmt.author: Brown, George, 1650-1730.
Dary, Michael. Dary's Miscellanies.
Cooke, Francis, fl. 1669. Principles of geometrie.
Georgius, Henisschius. Tables of the astronomical institutions.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.

With "The Principles of geometrie ... / Francis Cooke. London, 1669" [88 p.] and with "Dary's Miscellanies ... a collection of mathematical theorems ... / by Michael Dary." [15], 46 p. Fold-out chart "Gauging Epitomized" at end.
